text: @realDonaldTrump Dear President Trump you have got to win in 2020.  What scares me almost as much as coronavirus is Socialism and who the Socialists are that Bernie Sanders would put in his administration, those people are unknown to us right now and that's scary. Would his VP be his wife.

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.
